name: Vow of the Deep
simple_desc: Deals Quantum DMG to all enemies and gains increased DMG multiplier for follow-up attack.
desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to #3[i]% of Jade's ATK to all enemies. At the same time, Jade enhances her Talent's follow-up attack, increasing its DMG multiplier by #1[i]%. This enhancement can trigger #2[i] time(s).
